thread.section_title: Element New York Times Square West - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Our week at
thread.title_full: Our week at - Review of Element New York Times Square West, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: sarah k
title: Our week at
text:
We stayed here for a week and was not disappointed.
The reviews were very mixed however the room was perfect in size, clean we did not want for anything.
The staff were really helpful in every way. Upon arrival we asked for a cup of milk so we could have a coffee and this was not an issue.
People complained about the lifts again, we knew what to expect so was not surprised, we just worked around it.
Would definitely return to this hotel. Great location, centre of everything.
We have stayed at Novotel on a previous visit but would gladly return here.
